required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of Adenoma Detection Rate With ENDOCUFF VISION® vs. G-EYE®
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective Randomized Comparison of Colonoscopy Adenoma Detection Rate With a Disposable Cap (ENDOCUFF VISION®) (Endocuff) Versus a Permanently Mounted Balloon (G-EYE®)

brief_summary.textblock: The study is intended to compare the detection rate obtained by performing G-EYE® high definition colonoscopy vs. the detection rate obtained by performing ECV high definition colonoscopy.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a multicenter, two-arm, randomized, open-label study intended to compare the detection rate obtained by performing G-EYE® high definition colonoscopy vs. the detection rate obtained by performing ECV high definition colonoscopy.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Subjects will be randomized to one of two groups - ECV colonoscopy or G-EYE® colonoscopy

primary_outcome.measure: Comparison between adenoma detection rate of G-EYE® colonoscopy and EndoCuff Vision®
primary_outcome.description: G-EYE® colonoscopy adenoma detection rate will be compared to the adenoma detection rate of EndoCuff Vision® colonoscopy. The primary performance measure is the adenoma detection rate (ADR), which is defined as the percentage of subjects with at least one adenoma found, in each of the study groups.

intervention.description: ENDOCUFF VISION® is a disposable cap placed on the tip of a standard colonoscope, intended to flatten colonic folds and assist in controlling the colonoscope's field of view and tip positioning

The G-EYE® balloon is a reusable (reprocessable) balloon permanently installed on the distal tip of a standard colonoscope, and is also intended to assist in flattening colonic folds and control the colonoscope's field of view and tip positioning

overall_official.affiliation: Helios Dr. Horst Schmidt Kliniken Wiesbaden

facility.name: Helios Dr. Horst Schmidt Kliniken Wiesbaden
